timeline.bodyText: This fix could work, but it is not very intuitive for writing future tests. People may easily overlook the guideline. Do you think it's possible to reset the cluster back to normal after waged related tests? If it's not feasible, we may want to add more description for this guideline or not to name it simply as 0, 1, 2.
